The image of Bart Simpson writing the an: Islam phrase has been circulating online since at least 2010, indicating its existence for a significant period of time.
The anti: Islam gag looks different from most genuine Simpsons chalkboard gags, as Bart usually writes in capital letters, whereas in this claim, he does not.
The Simpsons Archive: a reputable source for information on the show, provides a collection of "Blackboard Openings" where this particular gag is not mentioned or documented.
Steve Heisler: a writer for A.V. Club, compiled a comprehensive list of everything Bart Simpson ever wrote on the chalkboard during the opening credits of The Simpsons, and the anti-Islam phrase was not included in the list.
